items.title: Singapore dollar exhibits safe-haven currency features. But it's no yen or Swiss franc — yet
items.summary: Experts believe that the Singapore dollar has safe-haven currency features and could potentially reach the status of the Swiss franc, although it may not be on the same level as the yen or the US dollar.

items.summary: Nestlé Waters wins Lion award for 'Sopranos' ad, showing that AI and TikTok trends aren't necessary for impactful marketing. By leaving out generative AI, they created space for 'Sopranos' stars to shine in the campaign.
